question: How can I improve my sleep quality and generate an image of a peaceful bedroom?

steps.content: How can I improve my sleep quality and generate an image of a peaceful bedroom?
Plan: 1) Search for tips on improving sleep quality. 2) Generate an image of a peaceful bedroom. 3) Return the answer.
Searching for tips on improving sleep quality.
To improve sleep quality: maintain a consistent sleep schedule, create a restful environment, limit exposure to screens before bed, and avoid caffeine late in the day.
Generating an image of a peaceful bedroom.
